title: Burger King
short_description: Nando's is a South African muntinational fast casual chain that specialise in flame-grilled peri style chicken.

dishes.name: Chicken Sandwich
dishes.description: Lightly breaded chicken topped with crisp lettuce and creamy mayonnaise on a sesame seed bun.

dishes.name: Chicken Butterfly
dishes.description: Two chicken breasts, joined by crispy flame-grilled skin. Infused with PERi-PERi and served in your choice of spice.

title: McDonald
short_description: Nando's is a South African muntinational fast casual chain that specialise in flame-grilled peri style chicken.

dishes.name: Popcorn Rice Bowl
dishes.description: This is the gravy-yard shift! Rice layered with spicy, exotic gravy & topped off with crispy popcorn chicken!

dishes.name: Cinnamon Roll
dishes.description: Cinnamon Roll at McDonald's is served warm and loaded with cinnamon layered between buttery, flaky pastry dough that is drizzled with a delicious cream cheese icing.

dishes.name: Wing Platter
dishes.description: 10 Chicken Wings with either 2 large or 4 regular sides. Great for two people.

title: Nandos
short_description: Nando's is a South African muntinational fast casual chain that specialise in flame-grilled peri style chicken.

dishes.name: PERi Ranch
dishes.description: Marinated in PERi-PERi but grilled with no added spice. As mild as we go.

dishes.name: PERi-PERi Chicken Bowl
dishes.description: Portuguese rice topped with PERi-PERi chicken, arugula, roasted red peppers, cut grilled corn and hummus.

dishes.name: Quinoa & PERi-Tomato Salad
dishes.description: Crunchy lettuce, lightly salted pitta croutons, semi-dried PERi-tomatoes, crumbly feta and a generous handful of quinoa in a lemon and wild garlic dressing. Itâ€™s filling and then some.

title: KFC
short_description: Nando's is a South African muntinational fast casual chain that specialise in flame-grilled peri style chicken.

dishes.name: Hot Wings Box
dishes.description: Enjoy 2 pcs Leg Piece, 4 pcs Hot Wings, 1 pc Bun and 1 Regular Fries only at Tk.399 in KFC Value Box! Everything you get altogether here!

dishes.name: Buddy Rice Combo
dishes.description: You and a buddy ready to have your fill? The Buddy Rice Combo is a perfect solution with 2 Popcorn Rice Bowlz & 8pcs Hot Wings.
